title: [Online Recovery] Unsafe online recovery failed with info “unsafe recovery enters exit force leader stage exceeds timeout”
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks! -->

### What did you do?
1、down two tikv
2、execute online unsafe recovery

### What did you expect to see?
Unsafe recovery success

### What did you see instead?
  },
  {
    "info": "Unsafe recovery enters exit force leader stage",
    "time": "2022-05-25 09:22:54.728",
    "details": [
      "Exceeds timeout 2022-05-25 09:22:54.399620114 +0000 UTC m=+82128.320209995"
    ]
  },
  {
    "info": "Collecting reports from alive stores(0/2)",
    "time": "2022-05-25 09:22:54.728",
    "details": [
      "Stores that have not dispatched plan: 5136724, 5136696",
      "Stores that have reported to PD: ",
      "Stores that have not reported to PD: "
    ]


### What version of PD are you using (`pd-server -V`)?
/ # ./pd-server -V
Release Version: v6.1.0
Edition: Community
Git Commit Hash: a6689e0efec71d9b27c6ea45b1f9dd0e0ee11af5
Git Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.1.0
UTC Build Time:  2022-05-23 01:59:27
